properties.name: editMode
properties.description: Edit / authoring mode.

properties.description: Binding so we can style based on drawer status

properties.name: route
properties.description: App route tracking.

properties.name: currentTitle
properties.description: Title for the content

properties.name: outlineTitle
properties.description: Title for the top of the bar

properties.description: Title for the top of the bar

properties.name: soundFinish
properties.description: If the sound should play on finish.

properties.name: sound
properties.description: If the sound should play on complete.

properties.name: completeSound
properties.description: Completing a step sound.

properties.name: finishedSound
properties.description: Finished sound file.

properties.name: scrollPosition
properties.description: Distance through the present document so we can visualize

properties.description: Track the active page exposed from the progress bar.

properties.name: activeOutline
properties.description: Track the active outline to load data for the progress bar.

properties.description: List of items in our outline presently.

properties.description: List of items in our book presently.

properties.description: Params for the request for outline/book to load.

properties.description: Returned data for processing.

properties.name: bookData
properties.description: Returned data for processing.

properties.name: pageData
properties.description: Returned data for processing.

properties.name: outlinePath
properties.description: data pathway that expects the present outline returned.

properties.name: bookPath
properties.description: data pathway that expects the book chapters returned.

properties.name: pagePath
properties.description: data pathway that expects the book chapters returned.

properties.name: hasPrevPage
properties.description: Simple flag for having the previous button show.

properties.name: prevLabel
properties.description: Previous page title.

properties.name: hasNextPage
properties.description: Simple flag for having the next button show.

properties.name: nextLabel
properties.description: Next page title.

properties.name: resetScroll
properties.description: Ensure scrolling doesn't influence during a transition.

properties.name: currentPageData
properties.description: Store current page data.

properties.name: responseData
properties.description: Store current page data.

properties.name: rebuildOutline
properties.description: Rebuild outline flag so we know to call it on page build.

properties.name: fullWidth
properties.description: Track if we should go full width or not.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Ready event.

methods.name: _fullWidthChanged
methods.description: When element is told to be full width it'll close things.

methods.name: progressdashboardopen
methods.description: Handle click on dashboard to trigger loading data.

methods.name: _computePageUpdatePath
methods.description: Generate path to point to the right endpoint for updating items.

methods.name: _haxOperation
methods.description: Hax operation capture and UI routing.

methods.name: _haxContentInsert
methods.description: HAX Content Insert.

methods.name: _computeCreateRequestBody
methods.description: Calculate what would happen if we added a page here.

methods.name: _toggleEditMode
methods.description: Simple state toggle for edit button being pressed.

methods.name: _editModeChanged
methods.description: React when state changes for editMode

methods.name: _handleUpdateResponse
methods.description: Get response back from the server on updating this content.

methods.name: _bookOutlineTap
methods.description: Change the activeOutline

methods.name: _activeOutlineChanged
methods.description:
A book level button was pressed, we need to invoke a change of
content as well as outline.

methods.name: _routeChanged
methods.description:
If the current route is outside the scope of our app then allow
the website to break out of the single page application routing.

methods.name: _resetScroll
methods.description: Reset scroll position visually and internally data wise.

methods.name: _activePageChanged
methods.description: React to active page being changed.

methods.name: _outlineItemsChanged
methods.description: React to items being changed.

methods.name: testMilestone
methods.description:
Test what milestone has been hit and if we should start to preload
items as a result of it!

methods.name: _scrollChanged
methods.description: Pass down scroll change to the element for progress visualization.

methods.name: _nextBtn
methods.description: Pass down the click to the next page if we have one

methods.name: _prevBtn
methods.description: Pass down the click to the prev page if we have one

methods.name: toggleBook
methods.description: Toggle the book drawer

methods.name: handleOutlineResponse
methods.description: Handle the response.

methods.name: handleBookResponse
methods.description: Handle the response.

methods.name: handlePageResponse
methods.description: Page response callback.

methods.name: _currentPageDataUpdated
methods.description:
Handle page object getting updated. This allows
for updating parts of the page either from the localcache
or from the ajax call.

methods.name: _toArray
methods.description: Simple way to convert from object to array.
